knimeNode.name: JSON To XML
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts JSON values to XML documents.

intro.p: Converts JSON values to XML documents.
The json values might contain multiple objects/values which case those cannot be represented using XML without an artificial root node. For handling this case, you can create arrays of XML documents.

fullDescription.option: When checked, the node will create XML collections regardless of its input, else it will fail if there are more than one values/objects in the JSON cell
When checked, a new column will be appended, else the JSON column will be replaced

ports.outPort: Table with the converted XML column
